metadata.title: USN-7236-3 -- Linux kernel (Azure) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - Netfilter;   - Network traffic control;   - VMware vSockets driver; (CVE-2024-53164, CVE-2024-53103, CVE-2024-53141)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7236-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-azure-6.8-cloud-tools-6.8.0-1021 - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-azure-6.8-headers-6.8.0-1021 - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-azure-6.8-tools-6.8.0-1021 - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-azure-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-azure-fde - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-azure-fde-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-buildinfo-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-azure-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-headers-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-headers-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-headers-azure-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-image-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-image-6.8.0-1021-azure-fde - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-image-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-image-azure-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-image-azure-fde - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-image-azure-fde-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-extra-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-extra-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-extra-azure-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-involflt-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-involflt-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-involflt-azure-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-iwlwifi-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-iwlwifi-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-modules-iwlwifi-azure-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-tools-6.8.0-1021-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-tools-azure - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 linux-tools-azure-edge - 6.8.0-1021.25~22.04.1 No subscription required
